EmailTemplate.description: 26/06/2014 Help Needed for A Midsummer Night's Production
EmailTemplate.name: 26/06/2014 Help Needed for A Midsummer Night's Production
EmailTemplate.subject: Help Needed for School Production
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
Please could you help out with the remaining props needed for Thursday's production of A Midsummer Night's Dream. If you have any of these items, please email me at janine.murphy@britishschool.edu.my and deliver to Secondary Reception asap. Also, if anyone has a smoke machine we could borrow, I'd be very grateful.
Many thanks, Janine Murphy
pull along Burberry check/ Louis Vuitton smallish suitcase bright sleeping bags (6) checked blankets 2X picnic style 2 baskets to be carried over an arm fake rose petals to go in the baskets a bundle of firewood sticks unwanted kid's toy guitar that could be smashed up hand held largish mirror (preferably silver backed but not valuable). It is a school play afterall! large purple flower Elizabethan dress/Disney princess large enough to fit a fourteen year old. Two ladies wigs, preferably styled into top knots with ringlets.
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
